title: 【修仙英语】半成品【同学一起监制】
author: AD【钙奶】
txt_content:
因为我们都是英语渣，可能有错误2333
 Last night, gainai didn't sleep.

Because,he had a dream.
 He want to become a god.


Then, he is going to hell.

but sometimes he is going to heaven.
完[明天继续编写]

聊天过程

replies.txt_content: 每日一修........ 我都快成魔了 还仙

replies.txt_content: we are Chinese,right?But why are we talking in English?my Engliah is not good,and I fail in English exam today,I'm so sad.

replies.author: Java_command
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Java_command 于 2017-3-16 09:01 编辑 

ne pas god，il est immortal，ne pas become a god，il est
take pills of immortality and cultivate oneself to become on immortal
ne pas He want，il est He wanted。
Je parle francais:
la nuit dernière, Gainai ne logait pas.
Parce que, il avait un rêve.
Il voulait être un immortel.
Il est allé à l'enfer.
Mais quelquefois, il est allé au ciel.

replies.txt_content: dalao别虐了 我到现在英语水平还是小学 因为我太懒了 不愿意背 原谅我
